data.author: Kevin Kruse
data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

data.author: Robert Frost
data.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.

data.author: Florence Nightingale
data.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

data.author: Wayne Gretzky
data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

data.author: Michael Jordan
data.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

data.author: Amelia Earhart
data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

data.author: Kevin Kruse
data.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

data.author: Kevin Kruse
data.quote: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.

data.author: John Lennon
data.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.

data.author: Earl Nightingale
data.quote: We become what we think about.

data.author: Charles Swindoll
data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.

data.author: Alice Walker
data.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.

data.author: Buddha
data.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

data.author: Chinese Proverb
data.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

data.author: Woody Allen
data.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
